reviews.review_msg: Dr. Roberts is a fantastic professor. He encouraged free thinking and taught us not only the how, but the benefits of questioning the foundations of linguistic theory. Well-read, engaging and inspiring, Dr. Roberts is obviously very interested in the field and, most importantly, in his students.

It can be very frustrating to try and figure out what's important and what's just him talking! But he never gives you a simplistic answer. He challenges your assumptions, and if you're open to learning, you'll benefit from your efforts.
She is not helpful even if you go to see her during her office hours. She does not give you clear guidance when you are stuck on assignment questions. She is also an unfair marker.
